appearances.title: Squawk Box : CNBC : January 13, 2026 6:00am-9:00am EST
appearances.snippet: joining us now with the details, congressman august pfluger, chairman of the republican study committee mr. chairman, and it's good to see you. thanks for joining us this morning. >> well, joe, thanks for having me. and we have 190 members who've been working on a second reconciliation. joe biden spent four years trying to destroy the economy, rising inflation, out of control regulations. american families all across the country were hurting. and that's why today we roll out the making the american dream more affordable act, which is a combination of bills that's centered around a couple of major themes, including housing, energy and health care. but we want to make it more affordable. president trump has supercharged our economy, and now it's our time in congress to act, to codify what he has done, to make sure that this is long lasting and that families can enjoy the benefits that he rightfully has been working on. >> right. congressman, does it address who do we have on we've had on some of your colleagues talking about another reconciliation bill that i guess jodey arrington was tal
